{include "default_salutation"} –

Happy New Year to you and your loved ones. Looking back at 2020, we faced enormous challenges. But, together with our partners and supporters, we did good work, won important victories, and made a real difference in the lives of Montanans.

In 2020, we moved closer to true equality for LGBTQ people, protected the voting rights of Indigenous people, educated voters about important issues during the 2020 election, made steps in reforming our criminal legal system, safeguarded the rights of immigrants, and more. Read all about our top accomplishments from last year.

We are privileged and humbled to have the opportunity to contribute to a Montana that is fair, equitable, and free. With 2020 behind us, this is not the time to slow down. We are preparing for the 2021 legislative session and other work on the horizon.

Thank you for supporting our work. It's people like you who keep us going!
